list_definition.definition: to leave or withdraw from (a place), especially because of danger

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The troops evacuated their position because of the enemy’s advance.

list_definition.definition: to cause (inhabitants etc) to leave a place, especially because of danger

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Children were evacuated from the city to the country during the war.
